title: What are the differences between 'communication technology' and 'multimedia'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Multimedia is more about the production of media-rich systems whereas communications technology is more about how that multimedia is delivered. You will find lots of dictionaries on ‘Internet and Multimedia’ - the reference to the Internet is the reference to a form of communications technology used to transfer multimedia.

Multimedia means more than one medium or media. Information Technology is the trade of keeping computers and networks running and working smoothly. One is a word that encompasses many things, and one is a sector in the market. What are you actually asking, have you heard of Google?
